data.title: Increase scroll amount on game server list?
data.body:
Currently it scrolls around 8 pixels at once. It's quite tedious to scroll the list with that speed.

I think it was supposed to scroll 8 _lines_ at once?

data.title: Menu should display something other than a black screen with shellmap disabled.
data.body:
Maybe some kinda hires image of a mammoth tank or something else i dunno.

Like this
http://img3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20101218021245/cnc/images/4/49/Destroy_Prototype_Facility17.jpg

Or just a screenshot of the shellmap would be nice
## <bountysource-plugin>

Want to back this issue? **[Post a bounty on it!](https://www.bountysource.com/issues/1447687-menu-should-display-something-other-than-a-black-screen-with-shellmap-disabled?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github)** We accept bounties via [Bountysource](https://www.bountysource.com/?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github).
</bountysource-plugin>

data.title: Rank chevrons are on desert shellmap's ships
data.body:
We should remove these to be consistent with the rank art removals for the other units.
Or better - fix the underlying issues and pull out the infantry death sounds to a different trait

data.title: Fix missing ZOffset in FIX's damaged-idle sequence. Fixes #4954
data.body: As the title says.  I tested that it works as advertised and also looked at my replay, where the issue did not show up again either.

data.title: Will there be a red alert 2 in openra?
data.body: If so,will it have the feauture's of yuri's revenge and mental omega?

data.title: Buff ftrk a bit
data.body: ftrk kind of sucks against aircraft at the moment but it should be good at fighting them. This patch makes them a little bit better at surviving and warding off enemy aircraft.

data.title: Add atom bomb beacon poster to ra
Commando Ignores Stance
data.body: If I have a commando in an enemy base, I don't want him to start shooting at harvesters as that attracts attention. I set his stance to "HoldFire" but it seems to have no effect.

data.title: Disabling and Multiple Superweapons
data.body: I would like a new feature: the ability to disable air strikes and superweapons, and also the ability to allow multiple air strikes and superweapons as well. (One per structure)

data.title: Tech Level
data.body: Like the original C&C or RA, be able to set a tech level for games. This means that all units and structures are assigned a tech level, generally from 1-10. Units and structures with a tech level higher than the level set for the game cannot be used.

data.title: Graphics glitch with turreted unit on repair pad
data.body:
Only the turret is shown, the unit's body only shows when the repair pad lights up.

![screenshot](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/4331210/2493844/29dbc756-b2a9-11e3-983f-8bfebbb21b3a.png)

data.title: Overhauled mod selector.
data.body:
This adds a new global mod selector that improves the visibility of our other mods and ties in with the website design.

![chooser](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/167819/2494952/bdb62fae-b2de-11e3-89f8-c219261b93b0.png)

This is mainly for feedback/discussion at this stage; it could do with a little more polish before merging.

data.title: Add a dead zone before activating lasso selection
data.body:
Currently it seems like it goes through all the units under the mouse cursor, and selects all units that overlaps with the mouse.

That causes some serious problems and makes it hard to select units most of the time.

Couldnt this be made so it would always select only the topmost unit and break the selection procedure there?

The old behaviour could still be used if you press SHIFT at the same time when you click; then it could go through all the units under it.

data.title: Add shortkey to scatter planes?
data.body:
The 'X' shortkey doesnt work for planes currently.

There is a problem with planes which makes them all in one tiny spot, and its really hard to separate them because if you click one, you select them all at once.

data.title: Add shortkey to reload helis/planes ?
data.body:
The 'F' button tells them to land, even if they are fully loaded with ammunition.

Would save a lot of clicking if there was a button that made them land only if they are missing any ammunitions. Maybe 'R' button would be good for it.
## <bountysource-plugin>

Want to back this issue? **[Post a bounty on it!](https://www.bountysource.com/issues/1446555-add-shortkey-to-reload-helis-planes?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github)** We accept bounties via [Bountysource](https://www.bountysource.com/?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github).
</bountysource-plugin>

data.title: Possible to add enemy units into CTRL+1 etc shortcuts
data.body:
I think i pressed shift and selected enemy units too, in accident:
![](http://i3.minus.com/i4zSzPTi07dYG.png)
Player sabb is the enemy player.

I was surprised it didnt crash. Even after pressing number 1 to select the group, it still selected enemy units too, and when i clicked them to move, no crash and enemy didnt move.

So the only bug is that it allows to add enemy units to those groups. Unless that is intentional?

data.title: Show player and spawn details in the replay browser.
data.body:
![replays](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/167819/2492275/50c8267e-b21e-11e3-855a-fe0981680974.png)

Random faction/spawn choices aren't resolved until after the game starts, and so that information isn't available in the browser.

data.title: Lua scriptable AI
data.body: While our generic HackyAI seems to work quite well, it turns out the variables to control it via YAML may not be enough especially for mods that go into different directions. It is also not really possible to change the AI "personality" or adapt it to a special map without changing the code and recompiling.

data.title: Display shrouds borders
data.body:
Couldn't the minimap show "borders" of shrouds ? 
There could be a colored line (team colors) surrounding shrouds, This way, it would be easier to see if players have already explored the same area.

mockup: 
![shared-shroud](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/1732773/2490595/199c2e04-b1b8-11e3-993a-fecbde083104.png)

See https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/pull/4942#issuecomment-38349496
## <bountysource-plugin>

Want to back this issue? **[Post a bounty on it!](https://www.bountysource.com/issues/1445318-display-shrouds-borders?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github)** We accept bounties via [Bountysource](https://www.bountysource.com/?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github).
</bountysource-plugin>

data.title: Windows - Display element scaling causes problems
data.body:
If you have a higher resolution display you want to scale your display this way
-> http://winsupersite.com/windows-8/hands-windows-81-desktop-display-scaling

Now for example, you set the scaling to 125% with a 1920x1080 resolution, ~3/4 of the game wont be displayed. See example Pictures:
Fullscreen: http://abload.de/img/fullscreenyllns.png
Pseudo Fullscreen: http://abload.de/img/pseudo24awn.png

Only workaround at the moment, disable dpi scaling under compatibility settings for th openra.game.exe.

I am not sure this is a real bug but it will annoy ppl with higher resolution displays which pop up at the moment (even those with the 3200x2xxx Notebook Displays)...

data.title: availCells higher prioritized than notStupidCells in scatter move command
Overhaul observer shroud selector.
data.body:
The list is now divided into teams, and includes faction and color.
This adds hotkeys (replacing control groups for observers) of 0-9 to cycle teams (+shift to cycle in reverse), and -/= for combined/no shroud (these are configurable in the options).

![shroudview](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/167819/2490406/a54e82aa-b1a7-11e3-95ab-798115334255.png)

data.title: Made husks targetable with force fire only
data.body: This is a remake of #3955 which allows force fire to kill husks without making the AI go crazy or annoy players in the height of the battle.

data.title: server not responding message overlaps menu
Replays of maps that play movies desync if movie playback is aborted while recording
Isolate gameplay map state from the map cache.
data.body: Fixes #4937.
